title: Hot pancetta, garlic, kalamata and tomato linguine
ingredients: ['200g hot pancetta', '30g basil leaves', '125ml good quality olive oil', '2 cloves garlic', '10 cherry tomatoes, halved', '4 tablespoons chopped tinned tomatoes', '80g rocket leaves', '70g pitted kalamata olives', '400g linguine', '1 lemon']
